banner.headline: Let's Talk About Your Project
banner.content: Whether you need a consultation, have questions about our services, or want to discuss a specific project, we're ready to help. Let's start a conversation about your business goals.

parentBenefits.title: Quick Response
parentBenefits.description: We'll review your message and respond within 24 hours (typically much sooner) to acknowledge receipt and schedule a conversation.

parentBenefits.title: Discovery Call
parentBenefits.description: We'll schedule a 30-minute consultation to understand your needs, challenges, and goals in detail. No sales pressure, just honest advice.

parentBenefits.title: Tailored Proposal
parentBenefits.description: Based on our conversation, we'll prepare a customized proposal outlining our recommended approach, timeline, and investment.

header.title: Send Us a Message
header.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

messages.messagePlaceholder: Describe your current challenges, goals, and what you're looking to achieve with Power Platform solutions...
messages.messageNote: The more details you provide, the better we can understand your needs and prepare for our conversation.

checkbox.label: I agree to receive communications from Rex Eight IT regarding my inquiry

privacy.note: We respect your privacy. Your information will never be shared with third parties.
